Package javaCalc

Class CalcGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
javaCalc.CalcGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CalcGUI
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements IView
Stage mettant en place l'interface graphique de la calculatrice
Vue du MVC
Author:
coill
